霱字的基本解释

霱
yù
彩云，瑞云：“泰阶上平，黄霱四列。”

霱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》餘律切，入術，以。］
瑞云，庆云。

霱字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霱； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1378第21
【廣韻】餘律切【集韻】允律切【韻會】【正韻】以律切，?音聿。【廣韻】霱雲，瑞雲。本亦作矞。又【集韻】卿雲謂之霱。【西京雜記】雲三色爲霱。

霱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
霱字的起名意思

彩云，瑞云。

Fei
Basic explanation of words
Fei
yù
Caiyun, Ruiyun: "Thai Stage is flat, Huang Fei has four columns."
Fei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guang Yun" Yu Lv cut, into the operation, to. ]
Ruiyun, Qingyun.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Words】　霱; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1378 No. 21
[Guang Yun] Yu Lu cut [Ji Yun] Yun Lu cut [Yun Hui] [Positive Rhyme] Cut with Lu,? Yin Yu. [Guang Yun] Feiyun, Ruiyun. The book is also used as a slap. Also 【Jiyun】Qing Yun said that it is ji. [Xijing Miscellaneous] The three colors of the cloud are 霱.

Caiyun, Ruiyun.
